name: Dead Oculus
description:
Dead Oculus is a lethal fast-paced bullet-hell where you can brutalize your foes by wielding custom weapons with cataclysmic attachments.


FEATURES:
  • Fast Paced Bullet Hell Gameplay with a High Level of Skill Expression



  • Dynamic Enemy Selection, Mission Types, & Mutators to Ensure High Replayability



  • Unique Weapons & Game Altering Attachments, Over 1 000 000 Possible Combinations



  • Original Soundtrack by Prominent Urban Explorer ChaseTO
